ComicInfo.Title: The Rabbit Wonder; The Cure; Be True to Your School; A Day at the Rat-Race; How to Recognize an Oregon Bobcat (to Preserve Life & Limb!); The Incredible, Edible Invasion of Earth!; A Job Well Done
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Quack humor anthology continues with Michael T. Gilbert's excellent parody of Will Eisner's The Spirit, The Wraith.
Editorial: Friedrich, Aragones (1 page text article)
Newton, the Rabbit Wonder!: Leialoha, Aragones (10 pages)
The Wraith: The Cure: Gilbert (7 pages)
A Fish Shtick: Be True to Your School: Skeates (3 pages)
On The Skids! A Day at the Rat-Race: Skrenes, Gerber, Weiss, Kupperberg (10 pages)
How To Recognize An Oregon Bobcat: Bucher (1 page)
Tales of the Oregon Bobcat: Bucher (1 page)
Tales of the Oregon Bobcat: Bucher (1 page)
You-All Gibbon: The Incredible Edible Invasion of Earth!: Shaw! (10 pages)
A Job Well Done: Macklin (5 pages)
*Duckula appears on the back cover, correctly addressing the fact that while the title might suggest otherwise, in fact, no ducks appear in this issue.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:26:14. [CVDB17124]
ComicInfo.Writer: Sergio Aragonés, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Skeates, Alan Kupperberg, Mary Skrenes, Alan Weiss, Steve Gerber, Dotty Bucher, Scott Shaw!, Ken Macklin, Dorthy Bucher, Mike Friedrich, Scott Shaw, Steve Leialoha
ComicInfo.Penciller: Steve Leialoha, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Skeates, Alan Kupperberg, Dotty Bucher, Scott Shaw!, Ken Macklin, Alan Kupperberg, Dorthy Bucher, Ken Macklin, Michael T. Gilbert, Scott Shaw, Sergio Aragonés, Steve Leialoha, Steve Skeates
ComicInfo.Inker: Steve Leialoha, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Skeates, Alan Kupperberg, Dotty Bucher, Scott Shaw!, Ken Macklin, Alan Kupperberg, Dorthy Bucher, Ken Macklin, Michael T. Gilbert, Scott Shaw, Sergio Aragonés, Steve Leialoha, Steve Skeates
ComicInfo.Letterer: Tom Orzechowski, Michael T. Gilbert, Steve Skeates, Alan Kupperberg, Dotty Bucher, Dorothy Bucher, R. Duke, Ken Macklin
